Name: Pill Puzzle 2
About the game: The bigger your business, the greater the responsibility! Now in addition to always paying attention to the color, type and position of the pills and fitting one pill at a time, in the right order, to complete the pack, you also need to pay attention to your customers' bandages, carefully pushing them into the box to give them what they need. Resources: 50 Levels. No time counter. Steam achievements.

Meta Description: Looking for information on Pill Puzzle 2? Check out the release date (Aug 20, 2021), developer insights from Coffee Studio, and a complete game summary.
